text: (March 26, 1942 - 25 November 2019) was a Japanese professional three-cushion billiards player and 2-time world champion. He was the only Asian native ever to win a World Three-cushion Championship. He died on 25 November 2019 at the age of 77.Japanese two times world champion Kobayashi (77) passed away ==References== Category:Japanese sportspeople Category:Cue sports players Category:1942 births Category:2019 deaths
title: Nobuaki Kobayashi
